item.title: A Little-Known A.I. Method Can Train on Your Health Data Without Threatening…
item.description: A Little-Known A.I. Method Can Train on Your Health Data Without Threatening… [ read more ] Machine learning has great potential to transform disease diagnosis and detection, but it’s been held back by… 5 min read Fei-Fei Li’s Stanford Team Is Crowdsourcing Robot Training [ read more ] Sorting a bunch of differently coloured toy trucks and action figures seems like child’s play, right… 4 min read Explainable AI: From Prediction To Understanding [ read more ] It’s not enough to make predictions.
